entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 12 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 12 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
